revised_title: A New Method for Producing Monochromatic Light and its Application in Crystallography
tldr: The author presents a new instrument for producing monochromatic light of any desired wavelength and demonstrates its use in the investigation of the optical properties of crystals. The device allows for even illumination of the observing instrument's field with monochromatic light, enabling accurate measurements of refractive indices and optic axial angles in crystals.
